import Mathlib

/-!
# Axler Exercise 7.11

Suppose V is a complex inner-product space. Every normal operator on V has a square root.
-/

theorem Axler_exercise_7_11 {V : Type _} [InnerProductSpace ‚ÑÇ V] [FiniteDimensional ‚ÑÇ V]
  (T : V ‚Üí‚Çó[‚ÑÇ] V) (h : IsNormal T) :
  ‚àÉ S : V ‚Üí‚Çó[‚ÑÇ] V, S.comp S = T := by sorry
